# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(s; text_width=10)
    words = split(s, " ")
    lines = []
    current_line = ""
    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = word
        else
            current_line = isempty(current_line) ? word : current_line * " " * word
        end
    end
    if !isempty(current_line)
        push!(lines, current_line)
    end
    return lines
end

# Example usage:
s = "This function will wrap words into lines"
result = wrap_string(s)
for line in result
    println(line)
end
```
